column4: anybody here know how to make the windows cd boot on linux.....ima attepmt to do a dual boot but ima install windows on the hardrive first
and then go back and install ubuntu
you just do what you said ;)
install widdows, then put the Ubuntu cd in and boot
hang on... you want SBM.... im looking for the link
right, but that doesn't mattter - the boxes bios is want reads the boot device
sometimes boxes have trouble with certian CD's because they don't spin up fast enough
with some work you can make a bootable usb thumb drive - got one of those?
can you get dad to turn it off or even just disconnect it from the LAN?
it isn't too hard to put the boot loader back either
but installing win, then Ubuntu is "easiest"
best is to reserve a partition Linux, but if the win Install wipes it out, the Ubuntu Installer will llet you shrink the windows partition
then intall windows however it wants to, and shrink it later
the Ubuntu Installer will llet you shrink the windows partition
